column2: "Yo, <%me>. You're really working hard. I should be taking pointers from you."
"Recently, I've been running around investigating a lot of things for requests."
"I wish I could pick and choose what I want to do like you're able to."
"For example; the day I met you Naberius and all of those Darkers appeared..."
"The reason is still unknown, so that's just one more thing for me to investigate."
"Anyway, I need to get back to investigating. Later."
